channel.title: Bash on Vadym Popov personal page
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Vadym Popov personal page

item.title: Base usefull commands
item.author: me@vpopov.org (Vadym Popov)
item.description: Base commands {% highlight bash %} redis-cli -h dev-1.aws.bkstg.com EVAL «local keys = redis.call(‘keys’, ARGV[1]) for i=1,#keys,5000 do redis.call(‘del’, unpack(keys, i, math.min(i+4999, #keys))) end return keys» 0 gamification:* redis-cli -h bkstg-redis-2.rduahv.0001.usw2.cache.amazonaws.com EVAL « local ttls = {} for i, name in ipairs(redis.call(‘KEYS’, ARGV[1])) do ttls[i] = {redis.call(‘ttl’, name), name}; end return ttls» 0 PermissionsFlagger {% endhighlight %} Create and transfer archive direcly to the romote host {% highlight bash %} $ tar -zc .
